an8.69:1.3: Khattiyaparisā, brāhmaṇaparisā, gahapatiparisā, samaṇaparisā, cātumahārājikaparisā, tāvatiṃsaparisā, māraparisā, brahmaparisā.
an8.69:1.4: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ upasaṅkamitā.
an8.69:1.5: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:1.6: Tattha yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṃ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṃ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṃ saro hoti.
an8.69:1.7: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi.
an8.69:1.9: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:1.10: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:1.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.1: Abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, bhikkhave, anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisaṃ …pe…
an8.69:2.8: Tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpannapubbā.
an8.69:2.9: Tattha yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇo hoti tādisako mayhaṃ vaṇṇo hoti, yādisako tesaṃ saro hoti tādisako mayhaṃ saro hoti.
an8.69:2.10: Dhammiyā ca kathāya sandassemi samādapemi samuttejemi sampahaṃsemi.
an8.69:2.12: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ bhāsati devo vā manusso vā’ti.
an8.69:2.13: Dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā antaradhāyāmi.
an8.69:2.15: ‘ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito devo vā manusso vā’ti.
